## serialRead() function

This function reads up to `rxBuf.length` bytes from the serial device.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function serialRead(handle: number, rxBuf: Uint8Array): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The serial device handle as returned by [serialOpen()](./lgpio.serialopen.md)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

rxBuf


</td><td>

Uint8Array


</td><td>

The buffer to receive the data read from the device


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The number of bytes read from the device
